I will accept it as it is my duty as a leader in transformation to adapt to changes as we work towards solutions. The health::: safety and well-being of my fellow Cyclones is more important than my personal wants. We are all different and learn differently::: so should we go online (and we should)::: those who do better in-person should be considered and worked with so we can all succeed together.
